title: Epic Games Buys Bandcamp?? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.02.22
description:
Blessing and Andy talk about Epic buying Bandcamp, Housemarque working on a new IP, Resident Evil games coming to next-gen, and Ukraine calling on the games industry for support.

﻿Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our Gran Turismo 7 review. That’s Greg, Mike, Andy, and Tim and it’s up right now on Youtube.com/Kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
The Roper Report   -
00:06:30 - Epic Games buys… bandcamp? - Press Release
00:16:56 -  Housemarque is working on a new IP
00:27:20 - A bunch of Resident Evil games are coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:29:04 - Gran Turismo 7 Review Round up
00:38:56 -  Ad
00:40:00 -  Real World News: Ukraine calls on Xbox and PlayStation to end support in Russia - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:42:50 - Elden Ring’s getting a patch - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:50:30 -  A new patch has been released for Horizon Forbidden West - Ed Nightingale @ Eurogamer
00:54:36 - Valve says it’s fixed Steam Deck’s drift issue via a software update - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:59:58 - Elden Ring Has an Official Candy, But It's Not for Sale - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
01:02:55 - Out today
01:04:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
